movies.title: Amelia
movies.plot: A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.

events.title: Amelia Earhart becomes the first woman to fly across the Atlantic Ocean, as a passenger
Amelia Earhart becomes the first woman to pilot a plane across the Atlantic Ocean
Amelia Earhart crashes her plane on the runway in Hawaii
Amelia Earhart goes missing over the Pacific Ocean
